preamble:
Follow these instructions precisely and adhere to the requested format exactly.
- You will be provided with a data entry text and a description of a data parameter.
- If the text contains one or more pieces of information about the parameter, return the input text where each piece of such information is surrounded by curly braces. No changes to the text other than inserting curly braces should be made.
- If the text does not contain any information about the parameter, return a single word 'NotFound' and nothing else.
